tool_description: Analyzes shipping costs and routes to identify optimization opportunities, comparing carrier performance and suggesting cost-reduction strategies while maintaining service levels.

optimization_goal.description: Primary optimization goal: cost, speed, reliability, sustainability

error_messages: Invalid carriers: Some specified carriers are not in the approved carrier list
Invalid optimization goal: Use one of [cost, speed, reliability, sustainability]
Insufficient shipping data: Need at least 30 days of shipping data for reliable optimization
usage: Optionally specify carriers to analyze and set the optimization_goal. The tool will analyze current shipping patterns and suggest optimizations.

current_costs.description: Current average shipping cost per order
